meals.name: Biscuit Sandwich
meals.description: The perfect way to start your day. A warm biscuit sandwich made with an eggs, bacon, cheese, and lettuce.

meals.name: Blueberry Waffles
meals.description: Three blueberry waffles, served with maple syrup and a side of hash browns.

meals.name: Coffee
meals.description: Choose from our various gourmet coffee blends and get ready for the day. Free refills.

meals.name: Buttery Crossaint
meals.description: Baked fresh every day, our crossaints have made this place famous. Buy two, get one free.

meals.name: Pancakes
meals.description: Any place that serves breakfast ought to have pancakes, and we're no exception. Choose from plain, chocolate chip, buttermilk, or blueberry.

meals.name: Chocolate Brownie
meals.description: A rich, chocolate brownie. A customer favorite for finishing out their meals.

meals.name: Chocolate Cake
meals.description: A slice of chocolate cake. Free slice on your birthday!

meals.name: Ice Cream
meals.description: One generous scoop of your choice of ice cream. Vanilla, chocolate, and strawberry available.

meals.name: Strawberry Milkshake
meals.description: 16oz milkshake made with fresh strawberries and real ice cream.

meals.name: Fried Rice with Shrimp
meals.description: Fried rice with jumbo shrimp, served with an eggroll.

meals.name: Hamburger
meals.description: 1/2oz hamburger topped with lettuce, cheese, tomatoes, pickles, and our special in-house sauce.

meals.name: Beef Noodle Soup
meals.description: Creamy, rich soup with generous portions of beef.

meals.name: Sub Sandwich
meals.description: A sub sandwich on a freshly baked bun. Turkey, tomato, lettuce, and cheese.
